column1: ‘Rebuilding America’ chronicles the reopening of the US after coronavirus pandemic closures

@meowshallah @julesjustme @PatriotLoveUSA1 @marcfromnh @rippinlips91 @woohoopatty1 @rowcliffe_d This coronavirus is turning into something we do not want yet it is well on it's way to spreading around the world. Time yo be very cautious.
